title: EP 10: The Tactical Productivity Hack To Get More Done
description:
Waking up sucks. No matter how health fitness gurus, yoga instructors, or meditation specialists spin it, getting up early is a difficult and arduous process for everyone.

However, those few minutes of pain and discomfort are worth it to create a deliberate and energizing morning routine. Whether you’re using that extra hour or two to be alone with your thoughts, prepare for the day, or get a good workout in, a consistent morning routine makes even the most successful entrepreneurs even more productive.

On this episode of the Tactical Entrepreneur Podcast, Steve Schabaker discusses how to create an effective morning routine schedule, the importance of communicating your new routine with your spouse and loved ones, and the long-lasting benefits of having a morning routine for your personal and professional life. 

 

What You’ll Learn:

  • How Steve has used his morning routine to be even more productive
  • Why creating an initially uncomfortable wake up time and morning routine is beneficial
  • What an intentional and deliberate start to your day looks like
  • How a morning routine will help you anticipate obstacles before they occur
  • And much more!

 

Favorite Quote:

“Creating a consistent morning routine enables you to be proactive and anticipate any obstacles before they occur.”

 

  • Steve Schabaker

 

How to Get Involved:

Steve Schabaker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
